description:
A dashboard for Terra blockchain (https://terra.money/) node using Prometheus.
This dashboard shows several important metrics of default terra metrics collected by Prometheus.
Maintained by dsrv labs (http://www.dsrvlabs.com) and please take a look at https://www.dsrvlabs.com/blog/news/monitoring_for_terra/ for more information.
